players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and confirmed it. We must vote him out today to avenge Alice and win."
Diana: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why would you investigate Bob first night instead of someone more suspicious? That seems odd."
You: "I agree with Diana, Charlie. Your story sounds fishy. Why target me right away? Maybe you're the one we should watch."
Diana: "Charlie, if you're truly the detective, why reveal yourself so early? This feels like a mafia play to mislead us. I'm leaning towards voting Bob to test your claim."
Charlie: "Diana, my gut said Bob was suspicious from the start, so I investigated him. Revealing early prevents more deaths like Alice's. Let's vote him out together."
You: "I still think Charlie is suspicious. His story doesn't hold up. Why investigate me first? Let's vote for him to protect the town."
